snippet.title: Dragon Marked for Death: Animated Trailer Ver. A / イメージ映像・バージョンA
snippet.description:
Dragon Marked For Deathは2019年1月31日発売！詳しくは公式Webサイトまで。

The Empress, Warrior, Shinobi, and Witch from Dragon Marked for Death come to life in this fully animated opening movie!

Dragon Marked for Death is coming to Nintendo Switch on January 31, 2019 in North America and Europe, with a physical release from Nighthawk Interactive coming shortly after! 

http://dragonmfd.com/
